md

Class MDUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • md.MDUtil

  • public class MDUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides driver routines for manipulating the system.
    Since:
    Sindo 3.6
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kiyoshi Yagi

    • Method Detail

      • appendBox

        public void appendBox(Box box)
        Appends a box
        Parameters:
        box - Box of the simulation

      • shift

        public void shift(double[] vector,
                  AtomList atoms)
        Shift the position of the atom by an input vector for a given AtomList holder
        Parameters:
        vector - the shifting vector
        atoms - the AtomList holder (Residue, Segment, SystemMD) in which the atoms are to be shifted

      • shiftToPBCImage

        public void shiftToPBCImage(double[] position,
                            AtomList atoms)
        Shifts the current residue to a mirror image closest to an input position. Does nothing if the Box is not appended.
        Parameters:
        position - double[3] The position in Cartesian coordinates (bohr)
        atoms - AtomList holder (Residue, Segment, SystemMD)

      • shiftToPBCImage

        public void shiftToPBCImage(AtomList atoms)
        Shifts the current residue to a mirror image to the current box. Does nothing if the Box is not appended.
        Parameters:
        atoms - AtomList holder (Residue, Segment, SystemMD)

      • getCenterOfMass

        public double[] getCenterOfMass(AtomList atoms)
        Returns the center of mass
        Parameters:
        atoms - the AtomList holder (Residue, Segment, SystemMD)
        Returns:
        the center of mass

      • reNumberAtom

        public void reNumberAtom(int nn,
                         AtomList atoms)
        Renumber the ID of atom starting from a given number
        Parameters:
        nn - the start number
        atoms - the AtomList holder (Residue, Segment, SystemMD) in which the atom IDs are to be changed

      • reNumberResidue

        public void reNumberResidue(int nn,
                            ResidueList residues)
        Renumber the ID of residue starting from a given number
        Parameters:
        nn - the start number
        residues - the ResidueList holder (Segment, SystemMD) in which the residue IDs are to be changed

      • termWithHydrogen

        public void termWithHydrogen(AtomMD aa,
                             AtomMD bb)
        Terminate with hydrogen.
        Parameters:
        aa - The atom to be terminated with hydrogen
        bb - The atom is turned into hydrogen, shifted to a 1.0 Angs distance of aa.

      • styleCheck

        public void styleCheck(SystemMD sysMD)
        Style check: convert PDB native to MD force field synonym (still under construction)
        Parameters:
        sysMD - The system to be checked (each segment has to be one protein, so that the last residue is the C-terminus)

      • subSpaceTraj

        public Trajectory subSpaceTraj(Trajectory inpTraj,
                               int[] index)
        Returns a subspace of given trajectory
        Parameters:
        inpTraj - input trajectory
        index - indices of atoms that defines a subspace
        Returns:
        Trajectory of the subspace

      • deleteAtom

        public void deleteAtom(java.lang.Integer[] atom_index,
                       SystemMD sys_in)
                throws BuilderException
        Delete atom from the system
        Parameters:
        atom_index - index of atom to be deleted (0, 1, 2, ..., Natom)
        sys_in - SystemMD
        Throws:
        BuilderException - Exception while building the system
